Lin Shuer's boyfriend, who was squatting on the car roof, was also soaked in the rain. Qi Jia asked, "Is there no other way?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia said: "If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to a rainy day, with heavy rain falling outside. The raindrops hit the piled cardboard boxes, making a dripping sound. movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Zhao Bing, with her hair in a mess, opened the door and stumbled in. If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."

Zhu Er said: "If you continue to talk, I will kill you."

Da Zang said, "I suggest you be more respectful."

movie101_7173948149160116773_2760_2940.text: Fang Baoyu, with a cold expression, glanced at the soldiers. The soldiers avoided Fang Baoyu's gaze and turned their heads away. Fang Baoyu then looked at Mulang Shenjun, who was kneeling on the ground, and showed a mocking smile.

Why were you calling my name? Do we know each other?"

The scene shifts to the desert, where Fang Baoyu lies on the ground, unconscious. Duchess Tuo Chen says, "You're awake, come, have some water."

Duchess Tuo Chen explained: "We've been chased by Wang Dian, and were forced to come here."

Fang Baoyu replied, 'I was being chased by the official soldiers, so I fled into the great desert.'
Duchess Tuo Chen asked, 'Why were you being chased by the official soldiers?'
Fang Baoyu said, 'There are some things that I know you may find hard to accept, but you must believe me.'
Duchess Tuo Chen: "What are you trying to say?"

Whether they are righteous or evil factions, they want to annihilate them, making the martial world vanish forever. The real Mulang Shenjun is probably already dead."

At night, Guniang came to Dazaang's house. Dazaang was sitting at the table, writing something. Guniang walked in and asked, "Haven't slept yet?"

Zhuer took the small pot, and Dazaang took out a small wooden figure and placed it in front of Zhuer. Zhuer looked at the wooden figure and asked, 'Is this me?'

Suddenly, she lifts her foot, and as she lowers her heel, a stone falls to the ground, startling her.

Fang Baoyu said: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"

The old man walked in and said, "You are my grandson."

Huyan Dazang, who was not far away, saw this scene and immediately drew his sword and rushed forward.

Wang Dian laughed and said, "You can't fool me." "Quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now."

Despite this, he does not surrender, but continues to fight with his sword, protecting his master. Wang Dian: "Not so easy," Wang Dian was kicked to the ground by Dazaang, and then Dazaang jumped onto the tree.

Shitai cried out, "Zhu Er, Zhu Er, please beg him to save dad please, please beg him, Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian said, 'Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship.'

The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun pouring water into a cup.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong said: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

The scene shifts to the interior of the house, where a servant reports to Bai Sankong: 'Report, sir, Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you.' Bai Sankong nods in agreement. Zhu Er is seen sitting at the table, writing something in a book.
Zhu Er, who was sitting on the side, saw this scene and stood up, saying: "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"

Zhu Er said: "I also cherish everything here." "But it's all over now."

Zhu Er said: "From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it."

Man said: "I really don't know that."

Huyan Dazang said: "Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers."

The scene shifts to the courtyard of the Prince's Mansion. The three of them, Fang Baoyu, Huyan Dazang, and Zhu Er, are sitting in the hall, while Mulang Shenjun is standing by the tree, listening to the conversation of the three. Zhu Er says: "Fang Baoyu, you must not be too sad."

The scene shifts to a military camp where soldiers are lined up in formation. In the center, a woman dressed in plain clothes is hung on a wooden stake, with a large knife placed on her chest.

The scene shifts to the training ground, where the two are locked in a stalemate. The soldiers brandish their swords, but neither of them dares to take the initiative. After a long time, Ben Yue can no longer hold back and charges forward.
Ben Yue shouted: "Baoyu, don't come over! Don't come over, Baoyu!"
The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun, who says: "You are really loyal, coming here together to die."
Fang Baoyu: 'I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?'
The scene shifts to the palace, where Mulang Shenjun sits on a chair, staring at the kneeling Zhu Er and says, 'What do you think?'
The two were as different as chalk and water, one swift and powerful, the other agile and graceful. The fight was intense and even, with no clear winner for a long time.
The soldiers on the field were no match for him, their cries of agony echoing throughout the air. The sound of clashing swords and blades was deafening, with the sparks flying everywhere.

The soldiers on the field were no match for him, all falling to the ground defeated. The other soldiers surrounded Huyan Dazang, but he kicked down one after another, his skills unmatched. The soldiers' weapons were all broken by him, and they fell to the ground in pain.
The two were evenly matched in their fight, with the soldiers behind them unable to keep up. They quickly retreated to avoid the flying dust.

The two were evenly matched in their fight, with the soldiers around them constantly falling to the ground. The two fighters' movements were like the dance of the moon and the stars, with the sound of swords clashing like the music of the heavens.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Li Xiaoran said: "It's not a duel, it's a beating."
The soldiers outside the door were still pressing on, and the person inside was already unconscious. The two women hurriedly took the opportunity to take the person away.
Zhu Er asked, "Why did you kill him?"
Huyan Dacang asked, '"Didn't you want to kill him just now?"
Zhu Er said: 'I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others? Oh, where are you going?'
Huyan Dacang said: "I have other things to do." "I helped you kill him." "You helped bandage my wound." "We owe each other nothing."
Zhu Er said: "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"
Huyan Dacang said: "He deserved to die."

Zhu Er said: "Hey, I'm going to follow you." "You have to help me explain." "You killed the person." "It has nothing to do with me." "Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice." "I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River."

Servant read the letter and said: "My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him."
Servant clasped his hands and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."
Purple Marquis said: "Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple."
Servant said: "Hurry and bow to your master."
Zhu Er said: "The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea."
Zhu Er asked: "What are you planning to do?"
Huyan Dacang looked at the flustered Zhu Er and said, "You should leave."
Zhu Er said: "How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran, I have no way to survive if I go back."
Huyan Dacang said: 'I'm going to a duel this time. My life is uncertain. Thank you for taking care of me these past few days. Please, go back.'
Zhu Er said, "If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die."
Huyan Dacang said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked: "What about your family?"
Huyan Dacang replied: "I have no family."
Zhu Er said, "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang looked up and said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er said: "I won't let you leave."
Huyan Dacang said: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."
Zhu Er, shocked, said: "You would even kill friends."
Brother Wang said: "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Purple Marquis said: 'I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world.'

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Purple Marquis said: "Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts."
Brother Wang: "I would like to show the Marquis something, please."
Servant: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Purple Marquis: "Yan Zhu."
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, am I about to die?" "I really didn't expect my father to still be alive."
Purple Marquis said, "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."
Bai Sankong, upon seeing the woman, was stunned and said, "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Purple Marquis said, "Do not come any closer."
Purple Marquis said, "She is really my daughter."
Purple Marquis said, "What are you doing here? So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead. What do you want?"
Bai Sankong said, "I am here to find my daughter. I want to talk to her alone."
Yan Zhu said, "Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment." Bai Sankong, with a cold face, walked over to Yan Zhu, who was lying on the ground. He crouched down and gently helped her up.

Bai Sankong: "Yan Zhu, why?" "Why would you rather hide your identity" "and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world," "than reunite with your family?" "Than acknowledge me?" "Does it mean you can even abandon your son?" "Why is that?"

Yan Zhu said: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong, with a bitter face, said, "If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."

Purple Marquis, who was about to leave, was stunned by the words and turned back to look at Yan Zhu. Yan Zhu, kneeling on the ground, trembled as she spoke. Purple Marquis slowly approached and said, "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: "I, Fang, Fang Baoyu."

Da Zang said, "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis said, "Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet."

Yan Zhu said, 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'
Da Zang said: 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'
Yan Zhu said: "You said the jade pendant you carry" "is the only thing your father left you, right?"

Yan Zhu said, "The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom." "You've always treated it as a talisman." "Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection," "I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old." "The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s." "I don't know how your master took you to Penglai," "but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me." "You are my child."
Da Zang said, "So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it."
Purple Marquis, with a face full of worry, hurried to Yan Zhu's side, and the two of them exchanged a look. Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, said, "My brother is very sick." "Please help me."

Bai Sankong, with a fierce glare and a roar, charged forward, but was blocked by a table. Bai Sankong asked, "What's your purpose from Penglai to our Central Plains?"
Da Zang replied, "To find the nine famous swords in the world and fulfill my master's last wish."
Bai Sankong said: "That's just a legend, it may not be true."
Da Zang: "If the master said it exists, it exists."
Da Zang, with a wave of his hand, the long sword in his hand was thrown into the air, and he said: "Say, will you help me find the divine sword?"
Bai Sankong said: "Unless the heavens and the earth are reversed and the sun and moon change color."
Bai Sankong: "Draw your sword."
The two upstairs and downstairs were closely entangled, giving as good as they got.
The scene shifts to the street, where the townspeople are watching the commotion. A person in a Taoist robe is performing a magic trick, standing on a sword.

The scene shifts to the entrance of the Heavenly King's Hall. A group of people are gathered around the incense burner, with white streamers tied to the pillars on both sides. In the center, there is a plaque inscribed with 'Qingfeng Swords Contain Trigrams'.
Mu Lang cried out: "Grandpa, I swear, I will avenge you, I will kill Huyan Dazang no matter what."
The two tested each other, circling around the long table. Mu Lang held a long saber, his movements unpredictable, making it difficult for Da Zang to defend.

The two tested each other, probing the depths of each other's skills. After several rounds, neither managed to inflict any substantial damage on the other. Mu Lang, with a shift of his gaze, signaled his intent to surrender, and Da Zang said, "I don't want your sword anymore."
Mu Lang said, "But I want your knife." Mu Lang took the knife from Da Zang's hand, and Da Zang, unwilling to give it up, tried to snatch it back but was blocked by Mu Lang's knife.

Mu Lang said: "Wait a minute, there is no one in the world against whom swords or guns are useless. In fact, I have a unique soft armor for protection, you can't hurt me, I can't beat you, so give this knife back to you."
Mu Lang said, "Then," "take the knife."
Da Zang said, "You're not lying, you're a hero."
The scene shifts to the dining hall, where Bai Sankong said, "So you're also going to find the Marquis in purple."
The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Mu Lang and a group of people are eating.
Mu Lang said, 'Maybe I'll have to fight him too.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Purple Marquis said: "Yes, that's him, the one who is looking for all the famous swords in the Central Plains, Huyan Dazang."
Old Man said, "Oh, no wonder. I think he's coming for your Red Sky Sword."
Purple Marquis: "I have fought him before." "So I want to practice the sword with Daozhang."
Zhu Er, with a face full of mud, said: "You are still alive, why didn't you come to find me?"
Huyan Dazang said, "I thought I wouldn't survive." "Okay, eat."
Old Man said: "Great, I hope the prince can use the unique moves of Penglai people and feed Daozhang. Daozhang must be looking forward to it."
Huyan Dazang said: "Why do you always follow me? This decisive battle is inevitable, you should leave."
Zhu Er said: "I can't believe that no one in this world is attached to me anymore. No one cares about me, no one pays attention to whether I live or die."
Huyan Dazang said: "You still have your father, he will care about you."
Zhu Er, unwilling to accept, said: "Following him, I might as well join the White Water Palace and follow my grandmother," "You really don't care about me," "You really want to let me go."

Huyan Dazang: "My master once told me a story about his youth. He had a deeply rooted love. One day, he went to a duel. My master killed his lover by his own hands. From then on, he had no worries and pursued swordsmanship wholeheartedly and eventually won the duel."
Zhu Er said, "Do you also want to kill me? Two days later, you will have a life-and-death duel with Red Pine Daozhang. So, you don't want me to be a stumbling block, do you?"
Huyan Dazang asked, 'Then why haven't you left yet?'
Zhu Er, with tears in her eyes, said: "If I don't leave, would you really kill me?"

Huyan Dazang, with a cold expression, turned to look at Zhu Er. Zhu Er, not understanding his gaze, slowly raised her head, only to be met with his piercing stare. She quickly lowered her head, not daring to meet his gaze. Huyan Dazang, with a cold expression, turned to look at Zhu Er.

Huyan Dazang, with a cold expression, drew his sword and pointed it at Zhu Er's neck. Zhu Er, terrified, tried to back away but couldn't move, as Huyan Dazang's swordplay was too fast. In a moment of quick thinking, Zhu Er grabbed the hilt of the sword, forcing Huyan Dazang to stop.
Zhu Er said: "Now I am all alone." "No one cares about me." "I'd rather die under your sword." "I don't regret it, I just hope you can remember me." "I want you to tell me, if you ever liked me."

movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.text: Zhuer said: "I don't want to die without knowing why."

Da Zang's eyes were filled with tears, but he still stubbornly did not look at Zhuer. Zhuer's eyes were full of love and reluctance, but she still could not let go of her pride. She did not want to be the one to give up, but she also did not want to be the one to be given up on.

Zhuer, with tears in her eyes, looked at Da Zang and nodded. Da Zang slowly raised the long knife, and Zhuer gripped the handle. With a twist, the blade was revealed, and Zhuer's eyes widened in surprise.

Zhuer, with tears in her eyes, looked at the dagger in her hand and then at Da Zang. She slowly lowered the dagger. Da Zang, with tears streaming down his face, reached out to stop Zhuer, but Zhuer ignored him and continued to lower the dagger.
Zhuer said, "Stop chasing after him." "Let me take care of you."
Zhuer, with a shy expression, lowered her head and said, "Please take care of me." Zhuer leaned her head on Da Zang's shoulder, and Da Zang held her tightly in his arms.
Zhuer, with eyes closed, leaned her head against Da Zang's chest, feeling his steady heartbeat. At that moment, she felt as if she had found a true friend.
The scene shifts to the outskirts of the city, where Zhuer and Da Zang are practicing swordsmanship. Zhuer's movements are powerful, and Da Zang's swordplay is equally impressive.
Daozhang, who was not to be outdone, swung his long sword at Da Zang. Da Zang blocked with his short sword, and Daozhang's attack was deflected, leaving him at a disadvantage.
Daozhang's weapon, a bamboo pole, was also broken by the swordsman, and the two were seen continuously clashing swords in the courtyard.
Daozhang was not to be outdone, his movements were as fast as lightning, with fists and feet moving at high speed, making it difficult for Da Zang to defend.
Daozhang, with a wave of his hand, sent the sword flying into the air, and before it could land, sheathed it again.

Daozhang, with a flick of his wrist, launched a palm strike directly at Da Zang's head. Da Zang quickly dodged to avoid the fatal blow. Daozhang then chased after Da Zang with a series of rapid attacks, pressing Da Zang step by step towards the Taoist temple's inner sanctum.

The night was deep, and the moon was high. The courtyard was empty, and the bustle of the day had long passed. Zhuer and Da Zang sat by the campfire, roasting a whole rabbit. The aroma of the grilled rabbit was enticing.
Zhuer sat down, took out a rabbit and said, "You can eat now, while you were resting," "I went out and caught a wild rabbit," "Hurry and eat."
Da Zang asked, "What about you?"
Zhuer said: "I'm not hungry."
Da Zang said, "Thank you."
Zhuer asked, "Why aren't you eating?"

The scene shifts to the backyard where Zhuer is, as the night deepens. Zhuer is sitting on a tree stump, holding a torch and continuously blowing on it. The sparks from the torch ignite the dry grass around it. Zhuer blows harder and harder, and soon the fire is burning fiercely. She then picks up a bundle of straw and continuously throws it into the flames.

The scene shifts to the backyard where the archers are practicing. The target is a wooden man with a face, hands, and feet. The archers aim at the bullseye and shoot arrows one by one. The arrowheads fall into the wooden man's eyes, hands, and feet.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Soldier: 'Bring a hundred taels of gold.' 'Go, go to Beishan to get a familiar ticket.'
Deputy Lu said, "Damn, how did you get back alive?"
Soldier: "They let me come back to report."
Soldier said: "No way, Deputy Lu! They said they only want Group leader and one subordinate to go."
Deputy Lu said: "Damn it!" "Group leader is having a meeting at the division headquarters." "I can wipe them all out in three minutes."
Soldier: "No, Deputy Lu, this will result in casualties."
Deputy Lu pointed at Soldier and said, 'If you nag any more, I'll shoot you.'
Mo Han said, 'Deputy Lu, he's right. We can't underestimate the bandits.'
Deputy Lu said: 'Just a few petty thieves scared you like this, are you from Nanjing? Don't make me look down on you. Brothers, move out!' With that, he led his men away.
The scene shifts to the headquarters, where Mo Han is driving and making a phone call. Mo Han says, 'You get Lu Xiao to come back immediately. I'll be back soon to handle this personally.'
Mo Han said, "Yes, Group leader, about the gold matter."
The scene shifts to a lush green forest, where a motorcycle leads the way, followed by a truck and a few military vehicles. The convoy is moving slowly, kicking up dust on the dry earth road.
Mo Han got out of the car and said: "Deputy Lu, stop the action, Group leader called." Deputy Lu said: "You called him, didn't you?" Mo Han said: "Yes, I was afraid of any danger."
Deputy Lu said: "You sure know how to seize opportunities." "No wonder, a graduate of Whampoa Military Academy who studied in Japan." "Move aside."
Mo Han said, "I dare not disobey Group leader's orders."
Deputy Lu said: "I'll count to three. If you don't move, I'll run you over. One. Two. Three."

The scene shifts to the camp, where a car stops in front of a tent. A soldier opens the car door, and a man in military uniform steps out. He walks up to the group of people, looks at everyone, and says: "We have received new orders."
Deputy Lu said: "Alright, you surnamed Yang, the gold bars are ready, so eager to curry favor, huh." "Give me the gold."
Deputy Lu said, 'I have followed Group leader for years. He is me. I am him. Hand it over.'
Deputy Lu: "No way."
Deputy Lu said: "Don't be ungrateful."
The car stopped, and a middle-aged man with sunglasses and a military cap got out. The soldiers came forward and saluted him. Mo Han said: "Group leader, you are here. We've been waiting for you."
Group leader: "Deputy Lu, are you here to save people or to endanger my daughter?"

Group leader turned to Secretary Yang and said, "Secretary Yang, take the ransom and come with me up the mountain." "The rest stay here." After assigning tasks, Group leader turned and walked towards the car.
Soldier shouted: "Is anyone there? Come out and talk if you have the guts."
The scene shifts, and the group leader says: "Listen up, heroes on the mountain. I, Che Zhenshan, have brought enough silver to ransom my daughter."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Che Zhenshan shouted, "Please come out and speak, hero."
Mo Han shouted, "Those who want money, come out." "Those who don't want their lives, come out too."
The two reached an agreement and immediately took action. The person in charge said, "First, put down your guns, put them all down."
Che Zhenshan, who was about to shoot, heard the gunshot and turned to look. He saw Lu Xiao running over with a gun. Che Zhenshan asked, "Where is my daughter?"
Another person replied, "She's right here with us. Did you bring the ransom?"
Che Zhenshan said, "A hundred taels of gold, not a single coin less. Please hand over my daughter."
The other side said, "Put the gold down and step back twenty paces."
Mo Han said, "No, what if you take the gold and don't release her? I'll go alone, handing over the money in exchange for the person."
The other side said, "Deal."
Che Zhenshan and Mo Han led the troops to the vicinity of the ambush site. Che Zhenshan asked Lin Lin, "Lin Lin, are you okay?"
Che Zhenshan and Mo Han led the troops to the ambush area. Che Zhenshan cautioned, "Be careful."
The guerrilla fighters surrounded the enemy, pointing their guns at them and said, "Throw the gold up here, raise your hands."
Mo Han raised his hands and said, "Release her."
Che Zhenshan pointed the gun at the officer and said, "Release her."
Che Zhenshan raised his hands and slowly walked towards the three of them, while Mo Han kept a vigilant eye on the enemy officer.

Che Zhenshan and Mo Han each held a handful of Lin Lin's hair, while Lu Xiao held a cloth in front of her mouth. Lin Lin was brought in front of Lu Xiao, who removed the cloth and asked, "Are you okay?"
Che Zhenshan, who had just killed someone, was still in shock. He walked over to the woman, took her gun, and continued to run forward.
The guerrilla fighters were well-prepared, lying in ambush in the tall grass with guns, waiting for the enemy to fall into the trap. The enemy marched on, completely unaware of the looming danger.
Che Zhenshan and Mo Han were still fighting with the enemy, and the situation was very critical.

Che Zhenshan and Mo Han were running ahead, with Che Zhenshan carrying a gun. Lin Lin was running with a limp, holding her stomach. She suddenly stopped, her face turning pale. She called out, "Mo Han!"
Che Zhenshan was hit in the abdomen and fell to the ground. The Japanese soldiers quickly rushed over and captured him.

Che Zhenshan was sleeping on the bed, and the person in the picture was him. He was sleeping soundly, but his face was full of fatigue. The blanket was not warm enough, and he unconsciously pulled it up. The kerosene lamp in the room was still lit, casting a dim yellow light. The room was silent, with only the sound of Che Zhenshan's breathing and the kerosene lamp flickering.
Lin Lin said, "You're awake?"
Mo Han asked, "Where am I?"
Lin Lin said, "Medical room."
Mo Han said, "I'm still alive."
Lin Lin said, "The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart." "For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Lin Lin said, "I was wrong before, I'm sorry."
Mo Han said, "The one who should be sorry is me." "I didn't know your mother." "And your boyfriend were all... by the Japanese." "I'm sorry."
Lin Lin shouted, "Mo Han, Mo Han, Doctor, Doctor!"
Che Zhen Shan said, "If something happens to Secretary Yang, I'll have your life."
Lu Xiao said, "Yes, my life was the one group leader saved, from a pile of dead bodies. The group leader can take it without a word, just for this one, an unclaimed, useless secretary."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Impertinence! Get out of here."
Lu Xiao said, "Group leader."
Lu Xiao said, "Get out."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Come back." "Lu Xiao should think longer before acting." "You've followed me for so many years." "Ah, how can you still act so recklessly, like a headless fly."
Che Zhen Shan sat in the office, Lu Xiao stood in front of him, Che Zhen Shan said, "There's something I can't figure out." "Tell me who dares to cross me, Che Zhen Shan, on this turf of Liu City?"
Lu Xiao said, "You suspect the identity of the kidnappers."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Although I haven't met all the local bandit leaders, I've heard of them. But the way this group acted today was strange."
Che Zhen Shan slammed the phone down and said, "Where do you think they came from?"
Lu Xiao said, "The bandits in the Northeast are causing trouble." "Could they come from there."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Seal the city immediately and inspect it thoroughly."
Lu Xiao said, "Yes, I'll go right away."
Che Zhen Shan turned around and said, "Wait, you accompany me to visit Secretary Yang first."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Look at him."
Che Zhen Shan said, "You're still my deputy."

Lin Lin held a bowl of porridge in one hand and a spoon in the other, slowly bringing the porridge to Mo Han's mouth. Mo Han, who had been awake for a while, finally showed a slight smile. He opened his mouth, but the porridge trickled down his chin. Lin Lin quickly wiped his chin with a towel.
Mo Han said, 'Yu Xuan, I'm leaving. Can you let me kiss you once? Just once.'
Yu Xuan smiled and said, 'Wait until after the revolution is victorious.'
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan, then turned and walked towards the door. Mo Han said, 'Then I'm leaving. Take care.'
Yu Xuan, who was about to go downstairs, heard the sound of a child crying and hurriedly went to check. She opened the door and saw a little boy crying on the steps.
Yu Xuan, who was standing nearby, saw Mo Han's condition worsen and quickly stepped forward to support him. The two of them walked into the ward together.
Lin Lin asked, "Does it hurt?"
Lin Lin wiped the sweat from Mo Han's forehead with a towel. Mo Han was still unconscious. Lin Lin said, 'Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life.'
Mo Han said, "It's not over."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said, 'I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved.'
Lin Lin cried and said, 'I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime.'
Mo Han said, "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin, holding the bowl, looked at Mo Han with a worried face. At that moment, Lu Xiao walked in. Lin Lin saw him and immediately stepped forward to take the bowl, saying, 'Let me do it.'
Lu Xiao walked in and said, 'Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you.'
Lu Xiao walked over and said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days.'
Lin Lin said, 'I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me.'
Lu Xiao said, "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said, 'What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?'
Lin Lin said, 'I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day.'
Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, don't joke around."
Lin Lin said, "I mean what I say."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter.' 'Hurry up.'
Che Zhen Shan, seeing Lin Lin so angry, quickly stepped forward to mediate, 'Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Lin Lin said, 'No need.'
Che Zhen Shan asked, 'Secretary Yang, are you feeling better?'
Mo Han said, 'Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Don't think too much, just focus on healing.'
Che Zhen Shan, who was about to leave, was startled by the scene in front of him. He said, 'What? The bandit escaped?'
Lu Xiao said, "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says""They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit. Could it be the Communist Party?'

Che Zhen Shan: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Lu Xiao said, 'They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked to the desk, put down the medical kit, and started to take out the materials from the bag.
Mo Han said, "This music is so nice." "Lin Lin, I think I should go back." "Living here is not very convenient." "You need to work and take care of me."
Lin Lin said, "Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away." Mo Han lay on the bed, staring blankly at the ceiling, recalling the moment when Lin Lin entered the room.
Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?'
Lin Lin said, "Okay." Lin Lin hurriedly ran to the bedside, supporting Mo Han with both hands.
Lin Lin, with her head down, said nothing and walked to the bed to put down the shoes and clothes she was holding.
Lin Lin helped Mo Han sit on the bed, then turned and walked towards the desk. Mo Han took off his coat and threw it on the chair, then lay down on the bed.
Lin Lin said, 'Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in.'
Mo Han said, 'Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now.'
The two of them were in a hurry, not noticing that someone was following them. They walked into the bedroom, and Mo Han closed the door.
Lin Lin said, "It's here."
Another girl came in with a bowl and said, "Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang."
Lin Lin said, "I'll take care of it."
Soldier hurriedly said, 'Let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it.'
Lin Lin said, "Hey, don't put it there." "How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly."
Mo Han said, 'Yes, yes.'
Lin Lin took the money and left, leaving Mo Han standing there, bewildered.
The scene shifts to the military camp, where Lu Xiao is bidding farewell to a soldier. The soldier, carrying his luggage, said, 'Lu Xiao, I'm leaving.'
Lu Xiao picked up the phone and said, "Where did he say he was going?"
Mo Han said, "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Lu Xiao walked to the table, picked up the phone, and said, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Mo Han said, "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."

The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is eavesdropping on the conversation between Lin Lin and Mo Han. He is sitting in a room, with a phone receiver to his ear, listening intently. Suddenly, he stands up, puts down the receiver, and strides out of the room.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: The scene shifts to the next day, with the sun rising over the prairie and the wildflowers swaying gently in the breeze.
Mo Han said, "Thank you for taking care of me these days."
Lin Lin said, "The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?"
Mo Han asked, 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said, "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said, "Then it should be well protected."
Lin Lin said, "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han smiled and reached out to help Lin Lin put on the necklace. After putting it on, Lin Lin turned her head to the side, shyly smiling.
Lin Lin said, "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said, "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said, "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said, 'Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you.'
Lin Lin said, 'You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?'
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said, "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said, "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han said, "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin said, "Hmm, who's more important than me?"
Mo Han said, "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked, "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked, "What are you thinking?"

Mo Han sat on the ground, watching Lin Lin's departing figure. He didn't know what Lin Lin was thinking, but he felt as if his soul was being pulled away bit by bit. He wanted to hold on to Lin Lin, but couldn't find the right moment.

The scene shifts to the campus, where Mo Han is walking alone on a deserted path, deep in thought. He occasionally looks up at the sky, as if pondering something. The night is dark and silent, with only the sound of Mo Han's footsteps echoing.
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is running frantically on the street, looking around cautiously as he runs.

The scene shifts to the street in front of the paper shop, where Lu Xiao is pacing back and forth with large strides, looking around cautiously, then turning his head to look at the paper shop on the corner.
The scene shifts, and Mo Han is seen lying on the ground, with Lu Xiao standing guard nearby.

The scene shifted, and Mo Han was seen sitting in a chair, leaning forward with his hands on his thighs, his head bowed in a daze. The rain was still pouring outside the window, and the dim light cast shadows on his face, highlighting the sorrow in his eyes.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, who had been knocked down by the gunshot, slowly got up. He took out a gun and aimed it at Mo Han, but Mo Han remained calm.
Mo Han said, "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao stopped him and asked, 'Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?'
Mo Han replied, "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said, 'Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?'
Mo Han looked at him and said, 'Lu Xiao, you seem well informed.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Speak up, who are you meeting?'
Mo Han said, 'Do I need to tell you?'
Lu Xiao pointed the gun at Mo Han and said, 'Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up.'
Mo Han said, 'Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government.'
Lu Xiao said, 'A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see.'
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao said, 'What, Miss Che?'
Mo Han said, "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said, 'Why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!'
Mo Han said, "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said, "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han left, and Lu Xiao drew his pistol, cocked it, and aimed it at the sky.
The scene shifts to Mo Han walking through the corridor to deliver a newspaper. He knocked on the door and said, 'Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper.'
Yu Xuan said, "Come in."
Yu Xuan was sitting on the bed at this time, wearing a beautiful cheongsam and pearl jewelry. She looked at Mo Han with a shy expression.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan."
Mo Han held Yu Xuan tightly in his arms, buried his head in her neckline, and said, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"
Yu Xuan said, 'Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him.'

Yu Xuan said, "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said, 'Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?'
Yu Xuan said, 'Unfortunately, that password is a fake.'
Mo Han said, 'Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber.'
Yu Xuan said, 'The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, "But realized the messages were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."
Mo Han said, "Okay."
Yu Xuan asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said, "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan said, "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said, "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said, "I forbid you to talk like that."
Mo Han walked to the window, looked out, and said, "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, "You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse."

Mo Han, with head lowered, walked straight towards the door. Yu Xuan, standing behind, was stunned. She never expected Mo Han to be so resolute. She wanted to say something but couldn't find the words.
Mo Han said, "I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you." Mo Han took out the jade pendant from around his neck and put it on Yu Xuan.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked, "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said, "Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me."
Yu Xuan said, "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han said, "It's getting late, I should go back now. Take care!"

Yu Xuan said, "Wait." Mo Han turned around, and Yu Xuan said, "Take care." Mo Han walked out of the bridal chamber without looking back, while Yu Xuan stood there, watching Mo Han's departing figure, feeling a mix of emotions.
Yu Xuan, with tears in her eyes, watched Mo Han leave. She turned around, leaned against the headboard, and started to cry.
Mo Han was hiding behind a palm tree, secretly watching Yu Xuan. Che Linlin walked by, and Mo Han quickly turned his head to look at her.
Mo Han, upon seeing Che Linlin, was stunned for a moment, then quickly composed themselves and said, "Che Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin asked, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han said, "What are you talking about?"
Che Linlin said, "Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin looked at Yang Muchen and said, "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"
Yang Muchen said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said, "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin asked, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?'
Yang Muchen smiled and said: "A bit. 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'"
Che Linlin said: 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.''
Che Zhenshan said: "Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?"
Yang Muchen said: "You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan."
Che Linlin asked, 'Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?'
Yang Muchen said: "Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?"
Che Linlin asked, "What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?"

Yang Muchen said: 'Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words... The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable. However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.'
Yang Muchen said: "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."
Yang Muchen said, "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen picked up the glass and drank it all in one gulp, and the others also raised their glasses to drink.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said: 'Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.'

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?'
Che Linlin said: "My affairs are none of your business."
Che Zhenshan, frustrated, slaps the table and stands up, saying, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin said: "If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me."
Che Zhenshan said: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said, "That..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said, 'But I was wrong, why did you hide that you have a fiancée, why didn't you tell me earlier, you can say directly if you don't like me, I didn't force you, you shouldn't lie to me.'
Lin Lin said, "I don't need your gratitude"
Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin, Lin Lin.'
Lin Lin covered her face with her hands and cried for a while, then said, 'Yang Mo Han, we are now even. You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately. I never want to see you again.'
Mo Han chased after her, calling out, "Lin Lin, Lin Lin."
Lin Lin struggled and shouted, 'Let me go, let me go!'
Lin Lin cried and said, "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said, "Things are not what you think"
Mo Han said, 'Follow me, trust me.'
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han with a face full of grievance. Mo Han, with a face full of guilt, didn't know how to face her. Lin Lin turned and walked to the sofa, sat down, and leaned back.
Mo Han said, 'I'm not going to the party tonight.' 'I have something to do.' 'I'll go after a while.'
The two of them walked into the living room, but did not see the expected Lu Xiao. Lin Lin asked, 'Where is the person'?
Mo Han said, 'Yeah, how is it gone'? Mo Han followed Lin Lin to the bedroom, where the curtains were drawn, and the bedside lamp was on.
Lin Lin said, "You are lying to me."
Mo Han said, "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"
Lin Lin asked, "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"
Mo Han said, "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han said, "I am telling the truth," and Lin Lin, upon hearing this, was stunned.
Mo Han asked, 'What's wrong?'
Lin Lin said, 'Nothing, let's go.'
Mo Han looked around the room, his gaze sweeping over every corner. The furnishings were luxurious, yet there was a sense of desolation.
Lu Xiao said, 'Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this.'
Lu Xiao asked, '"How do you know" "Have you been to his house"'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The group leader said: 'Still the woman who has seen him.'
Lu Xiao said, 'No, that Yang kid told me himself.'
The group leader said, "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said, 'Group leader, why do you always side with him?'

Group leader: 'Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day.'
The group leader said, 'Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself.'
The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he is sitting on a chair, listlessly staring at a loudspeaker on the table. He reaches for the record player, but it won't spin.
Mo Han said, 'What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking.'
Mo Han, with a cigarette in his mouth, sat down on the sofa, and Lin Lin sat down next to him.
Mo Han said, "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said, 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'

Lu Xiao walked in with a group of people, and Mo Han was sitting on the sofa with his hands behind his back. Lu Xiao said, 'See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak.'
Mo Han sat on the sofa and said, 'What if I tell you no, would you believe me?'

Lu Xiao said, "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The group leader said, '"Brothers, beat him to death for me." The soldiers swarmed over, beating Mo Han.
Lin Lin, who had been slapped, covered her face and ran out of the room, only to encounter the Kuomintang officer who had just been flirting with her. She raised her gun and said, 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, seeing Lin Lin's determination, angrily put down the gun and said, "Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?"
Lin Lin, holding a gun, said, 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said, "Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go."
Lin Lin fired the gun, and the bullet hit the ceiling. She was so scared that she sat on the floor, crying uncontrollably.

Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the radio and noticed something unusual with the girl next to him. He turned on the light, got out of bed, and walked to the table.

Mo Han sat at the bedside, holding Lin Lin's hand, watching her sleep. He gently stroked her hand with his other hand, his eyes full of affection. Lin Lin's face was serene, her delicate features highlighted by the moonlight pouring through the window. Mo Han looked at her, lost in thought. He lowered his head and placed a kiss on Lin Lin's hand, then stood up and moved to the other side of the bed.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, heard the sound of the door closing, thought for a moment, then got up and walked towards the desk.
Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the radio and got out of bed.

Mo Han, who had been beaten, was still not finished. He continued to search under the bed, but the pillow cover was empty. He then grabbed the blanket and shook it, but the ringtone still did not fall out.
Mo Han sat on the toilet lid, flipping through a book in his hand. The book was tattered and worn out, with missing pages and a dirty cover.

Mo Han sat on the toilet lid reading a book. The book was about the tragic love story of a young man and a young woman. The young man died of a broken heart after being deeply loved by the young woman. The young woman, on the other hand, died of a broken heart after being deeply loved by the young man.
Lin Lin was sleeping on the bed when suddenly she heard some noise. She opened her eyes and saw a figure in a military uniform standing by the bed. She asked, "What are you doing?"
Mo Han, startled, quickly stood up and said, "I'm looking for clothes."
Lin Lin said, "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."

Mo Han said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' Mo Han got up and left, leaving Lin Lin alone in the room. He turned on the light, but the room was still dimly lit. He walked to the table, picked up the kerosene lamp, and carefully examined the letter.
Lu Xiao said, "Please connect me to 4321." The phone was silent for a long time, and Lu Xiao repeated, "Please connect me to 4321 once more."

The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is still eavesdropping on the conversation between Lin Lin and Mo Han. He is getting impatient, and the phone line starts to make a buzzing sound. He listens carefully but still cannot hear the conversation clearly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hong Zichen picked up the phone and said, 'Hello.'

The scene shifts, and the next day, Hong Zichen arrives at the pharmacy. The notice on the door reads: If you have any housing issues, please contact the Maple Road Economic Society for assistance. One week later, contact the Maple Road Economic Society.

Hong Zichen, who was passing by, was attracted by the commotion and went over to check. He saw the notice on the wall stating that the rental income from the house rented to the tobacco factory was to be donated to the comfort women. He immediately tore down the notice.
Hong Zichen walked out of the room, looked around, and then headed straight for the door. Just as he was about to open the door and leave, he turned back to look at Man.
Hong Zichen walked in and said: 'Old Xu, I'm here.'
The man said: 'Hong Zichen, come on in.'
The man in black took off his hat and said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said: 'You've got the wrong person.'
The man chased after him, shouting, 'Friend, don't go, let's have a chat.' 'Friend, friend, friend, don't leave.' 'Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up.'
The scene shifts, and the Japanese officer is now aiming his gun at a person in front of him.

The scene shifts to the street, where the two are still at a standoff. The gunfire has ceased, and the two are now staring at each other. Suddenly, Hong Zichen makes a move, but is easily blocked by the opponent. He then changes his tactics, luring the opponent with a feint before quickly sidestepping and shooting the opponent in the left shoulder.
The man pointed the gun at Hong Zichen and said, 'Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you.'
Hong Zichen, with a smirk, said: 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
The man asked: 'What do you mean?'
Hong Zichen said: 'It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists.'
Man laughed and said, 'Not bad.'

Hong Zichen said: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
The man in the beret looked at him with a smile, and Hong Zichen also smiled slightly.
Man said: 'Deal.'
The man said: "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."
Hong Zichen said: "Birds of a feather, indeed. So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
The man said: 'No problem.'
Hong Zichen: 'Then you go on ahead.'
Man waved his hand and said: 'See you, see you.' Man turned around and left, Hong Zichen watched him leave and then turned to shoot at the straw man.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han ran over and said, "Che Linlin, how did you get here?"
Che Linlin said, "I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?"
Mo Han said, "I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend."
Che Linlin said, "I'm glad you're fine."

Little Eyed Man, holding the money, said, "Friend, see you next time, see you later."

Che Linlin looked at him in surprise, and Mo Han also looked at her in surprise. The two of them simultaneously turned their heads to look at the gate. Mo Han said, "You go home first. I still have something to deal with the old friend."
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin and said, "Forget it, let's go home together."
Che Zhen Shan and Lu Xiao were still following Che Linlin. Che Linlin walked into a restaurant and sat down.
Mo Han said, 'Speak up, who is he?' 'Speak up, and this is yours.'

Lu Xiao said, "Of course it's real. Of course. You can choose not to say."

Che Zhen Shan was stunned for a moment, then asked, "Are you saying Yang Mohan is a communist?"
Mo Han said, "That's what the informant told me directly."
Che Zhen Shan was furious when he heard this, slammed the table, and asked, "How much did you give him?"
Mo Han said, puzzled, "A gold bar?"

Che Zhen Shan, with a bitter smile, said, "Lu Xiao, if Mohan was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?"
Che Zhen Shan said, "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."

The scene shifts to the courtyard, where a man in a suit and a man in a black coat were walking. The man in the black coat said, "Speak."
Little Eyed Man took out a cigarette and put it in his mouth. Little Eyed Man said, 'There is a traitor in your organization.'
The man in black said, 'Who?'
Che Linlin lay on the bed, touching the necklace. Mo Han looked at the necklace, then at Che Linlin, and said, "It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"

Little Eyed Man said, "See you later." Little Eyed Man left, and Che Linlin lay on the bed, staring blankly at the ceiling. She turned over, grabbed the edge of the pillow, and slowly opened it. Inside was a wad of money. She took out the money and looked at it in disbelief.

The scene shifts to the courtyard, where a soldier is standing guard. Che Zhen Shan and Lu Xiao walk in from the gate. The soldier salutes them, and they return the salute. Then, they proceed to the table tennis table in the yard. The table is set up with two rackets and several balls. Che Zhen Shan picks up a ball and tosses it to Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: The scene shifts, and Lu Xiao is now walking on the street, carefully observing the situation on the street. Suddenly, he saw a comrade approaching, so he quickly hid in a nearby alley.

Che Linlin, who had been knocked down by the Japanese officer, was helped up by Mo Han. The officer, with a stern face, looked at Che Linlin.

At 3 PM tomorrow, she'll be at Ruifuxiang Silk Store making a qipao, wearing a chicken-heart-shaped agate pendant around her neck. Bring the account book and make sure to contact her proactively."

The scene shifts to the dormitory, where Che Linlin is holding a photo of Che Zhen Shan and asking, "Is this one pretty?"

Mo Han said, 'Che Linlin, don't bother with him. Boss, is it ready?'
The other person replied, "It's ready."

Che Linlin, holding a book, walked out of the house, followed by Lu Xiao. Che Linlin, holding the book, walked down the steps, while Lu Xiao, carrying a gun, followed behind. The two of them walked side by side on the street.

Che Linlin, dressed in a beautiful long dress, walked up to Lu Xiao. Lu Xiao, seeing Che Linlin, put down the clock in his hand and looked at her with a smile. Che Linlin also smiled at him and then walked to the other side.
Mo Han said, "Che Linlin, I think that one looks pretty good. Come over and take a look."
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin, then turned to look at the guard at the door. Mo Han said, "Let's go for now, we'll come back another day. Let's go."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Che Zhen Shan said, 'How can she be a communist? You have to take responsibility for what you said!'
Lu Xiao said, 'Commander, do you think I want to believe it? But it is the truth.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Enough, stop. Bring that communist to me immediately. I want to ask him myself.'

Che Zhen Shan walked to the desk, picked up the phone, and said, 'Linlin, come to my place immediately.'

Yu Xuan, who was organizing the books, heard this and immediately stopped her work. She turned around and walked to Mo Han's side, picked up two books, and asked, "The code you mentioned, is it this version or this one?"
Lu Xiao, with a serious expression, walked into the room and said, 'Commander, that communist is dead.'

Lu Xiao asked, "Do you suspect that I did it?"
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Small-minded, adding insult to injury, framing others, isn't that enough for you?'
Lu Xiao, kneeling on the ground, said, 'Commander, I've followed you for over ten years.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Enough, stop acting. Consider your years of service with me. I'll spare your life for now. Your career as my adjutant ends here.'
Lu Xiao stood up and said, 'Commander, are you really this heartless?'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'I've been lenient enough. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Don't go. Let me ask you. This afternoon at three, did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?'
Lu Xiao stood up, looked at Lin Lin, and said, "Fine. You don't admit it. Let me ask you, "why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"
Lin Lin said, 'You were following me?'
Lu Xiao explained, "I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist."
Lin Lin: 'Yang Mohan, huh, Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?'
Lin Lin replied, 'Simple, because he was working for the Japanese.'
Lu Xiao said, 'How can it be? Commander, I never thought it would be like this. If Linlin is not a communist, then Yang Mohan must be.'
Che Zhen Shan slammed the table and stood up, saying, 'Get out.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Linlin, is Mohan good to you?'
Lin Lin replied, 'Pretty good.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill said, "If you're going to go with him now,"
Lin Lin asked, 'What about him?'

Station Hill: "Just received an urgent call from the master" "saying there are three important communist underground members" "who will be escorted to Nanjing today" "having lunch in my department" "For safety" "I command you two to go and meet them" "You can't make any mistakes" "Understand?" "If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"

The scene shifts to the Nationalist Party's base, where Mo Han reported to Lu Xiao: 'I saw him enter that pharmacy with my own eyes, his behavior was quite suspicious.'
Station Hill said sternly: 'What can that prove'

Mo Han said, "I hope Station Hill will put Mo Han under house arrest."
Station Hill looked at the document and said, 'Is it necessary?'

Station Hill said: 'Lu Xiao, you are really like a monkey, you are really smart.'
Mo Han asked Station Hill, 'Station Hill, do you agree?'
Station Hill said, 'Do you think I want you to leave the adjutant position?'
Mo Han said, 'Thank you, Station Hill. Lu Xiao swears to complete the mission.'
Station Hill: "If there is a communist interception, must capture alive."
