Mo Han asked in confusion, 'What, I'm not needed anymore, why?'
Lu Xiao asked: 'Station Hill, why didn't you use me anymore?'
Station Hill said: 'Mo Han, come, sit sit sit,' 'No need at all.'
Mo Han asked, 'What do you mean?'
Station Hill, with a bitter smile, shook his head and said, 'There is no communist escort to Nanjing. There are only a few guards from the regiment in that vehicle.'
Mo Han asked, 'Then why did you do this'
Station Hill said: 'Just want to test Lu Xiao.'
Mo Han: 'Lu Xiao'
Station Hill said: 'He first suspected that you were a communist. Then it was Lin Lin. Who knows next he might suspect me.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan said: "The trap I set this time, Lu Xiao will either be killed by the Communists or be in big trouble."
Mo Han asked, "But doesn’t the Commies not know the news yet?"
Che Zhenshan leaned back on the sofa and said, "I've already let the word out, they will know."
Mo Han sat on the sofa and said, "Che Zhenshan, this move is really clever."
Che Zhenshan said, "Mo Han, fortunately you were specially assigned here." "Otherwise, I almost assigned Lin Lin Xu to Lu Xiao."
Mo Han stood up and said, "Che Zhenshan, now that you mention it, it reminds me. The cheongsam custom-made for Lin Lin should be picked up today."
Che Zhenshan said, 'The cheongsam can wait, stay here and watch the show with me first.'
Che Zhenshan said, "You're not from Plu City, are you?" Mo Han shook his head. Che Zhenshan continued, "Then how do you know the city?"
Che Zhenshan sat on the sofa, looking at the two people in front of him with a serious expression.
Che Zhenshan was already asleep on the sofa, and Mo Han sat down quietly, not wanting to disturb him.
Mo Han sat down and said, "Che Zhenshan, I still want to discuss the cheongsam with Lin Lin."
Che Zhenshan said, "Make a call."
Che Zhenshan, with a stern face, leaned back on the sofa, his eyes closed, and fell asleep. Mo Han, who was still standing, remained vigilant, not daring to relax for a moment.
The scene shifts to the military base where Che Zhenshan is seated on the sofa, Mo Han is lying on a chair, and Lin Lin walks in. Mo Han stands up and says, "Lin Lin, you’re here."
Lin Lin walked in and asked, "What do you need me for?"
Mo Han said, 'The cheongsam is ready. You go pick it up. I have a task and can’t accompany you. It should look very beautiful on you.'
Lin Lin said, "Then I'll go get it now."
Mo Han stopped her and said, "Wait. Show it to me when you get back."
Che Zhenshan, with a stern face, sat on the sofa and said, "Sit down."
Mo Han: "The order."

Che Zhenshan, who was pacing anxiously in the room, suddenly stopped and looked out the window. The snow outside was falling heavily, and the ground was already covered with a thick layer. He sighed and turned to leave. Mo Han, who was standing at the door, said, "Help me pick up some medicine."
Lin Lin said, "Alright." Lin Lin handed over the money, and the commander sat down on the sofa.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Mo Han asked, 'Group Leader, do you think Linlin looks good in a red cheongsam?'
Mo Han said, 'Sure.'
Mo Han said, "Actually, I think she looks good in any color. Don't you agree?"
Che Zhenshan said, "I'm a bit tired."
Mo Han sat on the sofa, looking at the ceiling, then slowly lying down.
The scene shifts to the next day, Che Zhenshan is sitting on the sofa in his room, and Mo Han comes over with a teapot, saying, "You're awake, Group Leader."
Lu Xiao said, 'Group Leader, we've captured a female communist courier.'
Che Zhenshan stood up and said, 'What?'
Lu Xiao replied, 'The prisoner is in the cell.'
Che Zhenshan asked, 'How did she get the message?'
Lu Xiao said, 'Secretary Yang would know best about this.'
Mo Han said, 'Me? Group Leader, you're the one who knows this matter best.'
Lu Xiao asked, 'Group Leader, what's going on?'
Che Zhenshan said, "It's not certain if she's a Communist yet. Mo Han, how about you interrogate her?"
Mo Han stood up and said, 'Group Leader, I'm afraid of being accused of seeking glory, better let Lu Xiao do it.'
Che Zhenshan turned around and said, 'No, you'll do the interrogation.'

The scene shifts to the Nationalist Party's base, where Che Zhenshan and Lu Xiao are sitting on the sofa, and Mo Han stands in front of them. The three of them are silent. The door is suddenly pushed open, and a group of people walk in. Che Zhenshan stands up, and Mo Han also stands up with him.
Yu Xuan was tied to the doorpost with a rope. Her face was covered in blood, and her eyes were swollen from crying. She looked at Mo Han with a face full of grievance.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Miss, this man is from Nanjing, and he's very skilled in interrogation, capable of using brutal torture. If you don't want to suffer physically, speak up now, okay?'
Che Zhenshan looked at the whip and said, "Hold on, give the whip to Secretary Yang, he will interrogate thoroughly."

Che Zhenshan walked up to Mo Han, took the rope from Lu Xiao's hands, and put it on Mo Han's neck. Mo Han's hands were tied behind his back, and the rope was pulled tight, leaving no slack. Che Zhenshan turned around and walked to the front of Mo Han, staring at him for a long time.
Yu Xuan was tied to a pillar in the center of the room, with a rope around her neck. Mo Han walked over to Yu Xuan, and the two of them looked at each other.

The scene shifts to the Nationalist Party's command post. A soldier received a telegram and read it to Mo Han, who was sitting in the room. Mo Han said, 'I have arranged for Linlin to deliver the encrypted information to you.' 'Indicating a change in plan.'
Yu Xuan said, "But I had already set off."
Mo Han said, "Once Linlin comes back, I’ll kidnap her and we'll break out together."
Yu Xuan said, "No, the 'Peony Pavilion' code has been encrypted by them; you must stay behind."
Mo Han asked, "Then what will you do?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: Che Linlin said, "Alright, if he won't go, I will!"
Che Zhen Shan said, "Alright, alright, let's pretend I never came here," he sighed, "Oh, sweet child."
Che Zhen Shan, with a stern face, walked out of the room, Che Lin Lin stood still, watching him leave. After a while, she turned around, slowly walked to the window, and looked out.

Che Zhen Shan said: "First, her mother was killed by Japanese soldiers, then, her boyfriend was brutally murdered by a Japanese bayonet. After her boyfriend died, Linlin became emotionally withdrawn. She has rejected every man I introduced to her, including Lieutenant Lu. I know she blames me. She blames me for not avenging her mother all these years. Since the death of her mother, she has never called me father."
Secretary Yang stood up and said, "Commander, I should offer her an apology personally,"
Che Zhen Shan quickly said: "No, no, no, Secretary Yang. Don't worry. She will apologize to you voluntarily in due time,"
Secretary Yang quickly said, "No, no, no, I think I..."
Che Zhen Shan: "Hold on." ZhenShan Che interjected, "Yes, Commander?" "Yes, it's Secretary Yang."
Che Zhen Shan, who was upstairs, heard the conversation between the two and was very angry. He immediately went downstairs to find Secretary Yang.
Che Zhen Shan, who was walking down the corridor, saw Secretary Yang and asked, "Secretary Yang, what are you doing here?"
Secretary Yang said: "I came here to apologize to Miss Che,"
Che Zhen Shan said: "This matter is not urgent, did you know, the special envoy Bai has already arrived at the division headquarters and will make it here by noon tomorrow."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Secretary Yang, I hope you will speak good things about us by then,"
Secretary Yang said, 'The Commander has always done a great job, hasn't he?'
ZhenShan Che said: "Thank you, thank you! I will never treat you unfairly, Secretary Yang. If you have any requests, please feel free to let me know."
Secretary Yang said, "Well, coincidentally, I wanted to send some money to my big brother but didn't know how to ask."
Che Zhen Shan said: "That's very simple. Just tell me how much you need, and I will have Lieutenant Lu arrange it for you,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Yu Xuan said, "I'm ready to sacrifice at any time."
Che Zhenshan looked at the machine, and then looked at the soldier beside him. The soldier immediately understood and ran out. Che Zhenshan asked: "Why there is no sound?"
Mo Han said, 'Wait.' Mo Han walked over to Che Zhenshan and took the headphones off.
Yu Xuan said, 'If you want to kill me, just do it quickly. Stop touching me, you stinky ruffian!'
Mo Han said, "I'll check if you have any documents on you." Mo Han searched Mo Han, and Che Zhenshan said, "Tell me, who are your superiors and subordinates?"
Mo Han said, "Don't pretend to be confused with me"
Yu Xuan said, "Beat me to death, I’ll take you all to the underworld, are you scared now, I'm not made of paper and paste."
Yu Xuan said, "Come on, you coward who is afraid of death, hit me, whip me."
The scene shifts, and Mo Han stands in front of a large bell, gazing into the distance. The bell gently sways in the wind, making a soft, rhythmic sound.
Yu Xuan, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mo Han and said, 'I don't want to die.'

The scene shifts to the Nationalist Party's tent, where Mo Han is still tied to a post, with a rope around his neck. The rope is pulled to its tightest by Che Zhenshan, who is standing guard outside the tent.
Yu Xuan was tied to a pillar, her hands bound behind her back. She struggled to stand up, her body swaying uncontrollably.

Che Zhenshan, who was sitting in the command car, was also tied to the same radio station with a thick iron chain. He was frowning, listening to the radio signal, his face filled with worry and anxiety.
Che Linlin, who had been hiding in the attic, witnessed everything. After the soldiers left, Che Linlin hurriedly ran downstairs, anxiously shouting, 'Mo Han, stop it!'
Che Linlin, upon hearing this, kicked Mo Han and said, "Are you crazy? I didn't expect you and Lu Xiao to be the same kind!"
Che Zhenshan, after listening, slowly removed the headphones from his head and said: "Okay, tell Mo Han to stop interrogation for now, and don’t let him get involved in this matter again"
Che Linlin, dressed in a silk wedding dress, walked into the room, her eyes fixed on the blood-covered body of Yu Xuan. She knelt beside Yu Xuan, her eyes full of pain.
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Yu Xuan's face, gently touched her cheek, and then slowly squatted down, carefully wiping away the dried blood on Yu Xuan's face with a handkerchief.
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Yu Xuan, then took out the key to unlock the chains. Lu Xiao walked in, and Che Linlin quickly stood up to greet him.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Ling Ling, with tears in her eyes, looked at the wedding dress she had once treasured, now soaked in blood, and slowly knelt down, bowing her head in sorrow.
Lu Xiao looked at the two of them, and the scene shifted to the lakeside where Mo Han and Ling Ling were seated.
Ling Ling, with tears in her eyes, looked at the wedding dress and reached out to touch it, as if trying to recover her sanity.
Mo Han said, "What do you think living is for?" "For the country, for the faith? Or for money and status?"
Ling Ling said, "I live only for the people I love," and with that, she pulled out a pistol and shot herself in the abdomen.
Mo Han said, "Look how beautiful this tree is," "It's a pity it's twisted by living in such an environment. What do you say to moving it one day?"
Ling Ling asked, 'But won't it die if we do that?'
Mo Han says, "No, it will grow even better." Mo Han reassures, "Ling Ling, I'm tired of the deceit in officialdom. Would you leave it all behind and come away with me?"
Ling Ling asked, 'Just the two of us?'
Mo Han thought for a moment and said, 'Maybe there's one more person.'
Ling Ling, with tears in her eyes, looked at her reflection in the water and slowly took off her wedding dress.
Ling Ling asked, "Mo Han, have you ever given this kind of pendant to another woman?"
Mo Han said, 'No, why do you suddenly ask?'

Ling Ling said, "I have always felt that we are not on the same path." "Like a swan and a shrimp pulling a carriage together," "The swan yearns for the sky, while the shrimp never dares leave the water." "No matter how hard we try, we can never head in the same direction."
Mo Han walked up behind her, comforting her by saying, "There's always a way."
Mo Han said, 'Ling Ling, don't cry. What's wrong? Do you not want to leave, or are you reluctant to leave your father behind?'
Ling Ling said, "Mo Han, let me think." "My mind is really confused right now."
Mo Han consoled, 'Don't overthink; sometimes life is very simple.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Yang Mo Han said: "Sometimes it’s complicated."
Che Linlin said, "Maybe."

A soldier came to report: "Yang Mo Han, the commander wants to see you." Che Zhenshan's wife, upon hearing this, quickly wiped away her tears and adjusted her state of mind, as if nothing had happened.
Yang Mo Han said, "Che Linlin, don’t cry, go to bed early." Yang Mo Han wiped away Che Linlin's tears and added, "I’ll go first."
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, watched him leave. She then turned around and saw her reflection in the water. She touched the water with her hand, and her face was full of sorrow.

Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, took out the necklace that Yang Mo Han had given her, and after looking at it for a while, she put it around her neck. Then she took out the bracelet that Yang Mo Han had given her, but as she put it on her wrist, she couldn't help but cry. She then took out the pair of earrings that Yang Mo Han had given her, but when she put them on, she couldn't help but cry out loud.
Yang Mo Han walked into the room, closed the door, and said: "Commander, I might not have been tough enough during the interrogation this afternoon."

Che Zhenshan said: "Don't talk about that. A secret order just came from the division commander. We are to launch a large-scale attack on the Communists soon. Mohan, I intend to send you and Linlin to America."
Yang Mo Han said: "The United States."
Che Zhenshan said: 'Yes, I’m worried Linlin might have unclear dealings with the Communists.'
Yang Mo Han asked: "Do you mean Che Linlin and that female Communist?"
Che Zhenshan said: "Before you leave, you need to do something important, kill this person." Che Zhenshan took out a photo of Shan Ben Ichiro and handed it to Yang Mo Han.
Yang Mo Han said: "Japanese?"
Che Zhenshan said: "Yes, Shan Ben Ichiro. Linlin's mother was killed by him. He just arrived in Liu City. He will be at the Baixiao Gate tonight for entertainment."
Yang Mo Han said: "Commander."
Che Zhenshan asked: "Is there a problem?"

Yang Mo Han said: "No, I just want to know. How do you plan to deal with that female Communist?" "I mean Linlin, if she is really with that woman." "I almost beat her to death this afternoon." "If anything happens to her, I'm afraid Linlin will resent me, so."
Che Zhenshan said: "As long as you bring back Shan Ben Ichiro's head, I’ll release her immediately."
Che Zhenshan: "Che Linlin, don't get excited." "Didn't I send Mohan?"
Che Linlin said: 'You sent him alone, isn’t that sending him to his death? Why aren’t you going?'
Che Zhenshan: "Che Linlin, listen to your father."
Che Linlin shouted: "I don’t have a father like you." "Let me go, I need to find Mohan."
Che Zhenshan said: "Do you think you can find him?" "Do you think he will really avenge you?"
Che Linlin said: "He will definitely come back, he told me to wait for him. He doesn't lie."
Che Zhenshan said: "Going alone, he’s walking into the lion's den. Do you think he can come back alive?"
Che Linlin asked: "Then why did you let him go?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Che Zhen Shan said: 'Yang Mo Han might be a Communist member.'
Che Linlin said, 'So, you intend to eliminate him through the Japanese.'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Yes, for you.'
Che Linlin said, 'It's for your own good, isn't it?'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Che Linlin, no matter what you think, daddy will always love you!'

Che Zhen Shan: "Hello, what, Lu Xiao and the female Communist fled together, are they accomplices?" Che Zhen Shan slammed the phone down on the table in anger and said, "Order the third company to assemble at once."

Che Zhen Shan, with a stern face, walked straight to the door and opened it. Che Linlin, standing in the middle of the room, looked at the doorway, then turned to look at the empty room. She walked towards the door, but as she reached the doorway, she stopped, turned around, and looked at the empty room again.
Che Linlin was startled and jumped up, raising her gun. Yang Mo Han said, 'Che Linlin, it's me.'
Che Zhen Shan, with a face full of grief, was about to rush out, but was stopped by Yang Mo Han. Yang Mo Han said: 'You can now console your aunt’s spirit in heaven.'
Che Linlin said: 'Mo Han, thank you. I can't repay you for your kindness in my lifetime.'
Yang Mo Han said: "{Why are you} so polite with me?"
Che Linlin said, 'I will follow you even if I have to cross fiery waters.'
Yang Mo Han said: 'All right, then let's go now. Shanyamoto will never let us go after killing the Japanese. But before we leave, I need to bring someone along.'
Che Linlin said, 'Bring the female accomplice. She has been taken away by Lu Xiao.'
Yang Mo Han replied, "Taken away by Lu Xiao."
Che Linlin explained, 'My father suspects that they are Communists and has sent someone to follow them.'
Yang Mo Han said: 'Lu Xiao being a Communist is a joke.'
Che Linlin asked, "What did you say?"
Yang Mo Han said: "I just feel Lu Xiao doesn't seem like a Communist."
Che Linlin said, "You seem to know a lot about the Communist Party."
Yang Mo Han said: "I wouldn't say that I know them well, but this time, killing Shanyamoto, I have to thank the Communist Party. They have helped me both inside and out."
Che Linlin asked, "Why would they help you?"
Yang Mo Han said, "They want the encryption key in return. I know the key is with you, so I agreed to their terms."
Che Linlin said, 'The key is not with me. It seems to be in the commander's office safe. Apart from my father, no one has seen it.'
Yang Mo Han said: "But it's okay. If necessary, we can kill the donkey after it's done working. They wouldn't dare do anything."
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, said, 'But...'
Yang Mo Han said: 'All right, you should rest early. I'm going to meet the commander.' After saying this, Yang Mo Han left the room. Che Zhen Shan took out a coin and placed it under the doorknob.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Mo Han slowly raised his gun, aiming at Lin Lin. Lin Lin was not afraid at all and stared at him. Mo Han asked, 'Lin Lin, what are you doing here?'
Lin Lin raised the gun and pointed at Mo Han, saying, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han said, 'At this point, I don't want to hide it from you any longer, actually, I am...'
Mo Han slowly lowered the gun, and Lin Lin, with a trembling voice, said, 'My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.'

Lin Lin said, "Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?"

Mo Han said, 'Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing.'

Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?'

Mo Han slowly walked up to Lin Lin, his eyes full of guilt. He said, 'Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.'
Lin Lin said, 'Thank you for your kindness and honesty.'
Lin Lin thought for a moment and said, "Try my birthday."
Mo Han tried to open the milk box again, but it still didn't budge. He looked at the lock and said, "It won't open."
Lin Lin said, 'Try my mother's birthday, 1208.' Mo Han opened the milk box, but it was empty.
Lin Lin said, 'Try my mother's death anniversary, 1011.'
Mo Han took out the key, opened the door, and walked in. Lin Lin, hearing the sound, turned around with a face full of grievance and tears, looking at Mo Han's back.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Mo Han sat down and said, 'Don't be sad. Let's go. Didn't you say you would be willing to go with me?'
Lin Lin said, 'If I leave, what about my father? You go by yourself.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had been hiding in the cupboard, immediately took out a gun and aimed at Mo Han, saying, "You're too naive to fight with me."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Come with me."
Lin Lin said, 'Let him go.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lin Lin, put the gun down. Do you want my life?'
Lin Lin said, 'My life was given by you. It was also given by him. I don't want him to die by your hand.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Do you know how dangerous his identity is to us?" "Lin Lin, he is a Communist."
Lin Lin said, 'I don't care which party he belongs to. As long as it's a party against the Japanese invaders, it's a good party. If you really love me, let him go immediately. I'll count to three.'
Lin Lin said, 'One.'
Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin!'
Lin Lin said, 'Two.'
Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, why are you forcing me like this?'
Mo Han said, "Give me the gun."
Lu Xiao, holding a gun, pointed at the three of them and said, "You and your whole family better behave."
Che Zhen Shan shouted, "Lu Xiao!"
Lu Xiao said, 'Che Zhen Shan, hmph, the commander will be here soon. He will tell you whether my career as an adjutant ends here, or your career as a regiment commander ends.'
Che Zhen Shan pointed the gun at Lu Xiao and said, "Lu Xiao, you beast, do you believe I won't shoot you?"
Lu Xiao said, 'Ah, don't be so agitated, my dear commander. Put the gun down.'
Lu Xiao, holding a gun, pointed at Che Zhen Shan and said, "Or I'll blow your whole family up."
Lu Xiao said, 'Commander, this is what is called the student surpassing the master.'
Lu Xiao, holding the gun, said, 'What a pity, Secretary Yang. You ended up mixed with a female Communist.'
Lin Lin said, 'Lu Xiao, thank you for giving me, the honorable title of Communist.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Then you should thank that female Communist. It was she who informed us about you as the hidden operative. You thought you could run, but you couldn't escape my bullet, Lu Xiao.'
Mo Han immediately drew his gun and said, 'Get down!'
Che Zhen Shan and Lu Xiao were still fighting when Mo Han suddenly burst in, shooting Che Zhen Shan in the leg. Mo Han quickly helped Lin Lin up and said, 'Quick, get up!' 'Let's go.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had just rushed out, was stopped by Lin Lin. Lin Lin asked, 'Wait, wait, where are we going?'
Lin Lin said, 'We'll talk outside. The commander will be here soon. We have to leave now, father.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "You finally called me father." "After all these years, you finally called me father."
Mo Han said, 'Do you know how many years I've waited?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Che Zhen Shan said, "My heart is broken from the waiting."
Lin Lin cried and said, 'I always thought you had forgotten mother, but when I used mom's memorial day as the password to open the safe, I realized I was wrong, I'm sorry, Dad.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Foolish child, you and your mother are the apples of my eye, the ones I always worry about.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Dad never remarried all these years," "just to preserve the love he held for your mother. Child, you must go, the further the better."

Che Zhen Shan took out the password and said, "Take these passwords with you, I have another copy." Che Zhen Shan handed the password to Mo Han, then turned to Lin Lin and said, "Mo Han, Lin Lin is in your care now, take good care of her."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Even if one day I'm gone, at least there's an explanation to her mother.'
Lin Lin said: 'Dad, let's leave together, from now on you can be a common folk, your daughter will take good care of you.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Enough dawdling, take the password and hurry on, I'll deal with them here, otherwise, none of the three of us can escape.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had been knocked down, got up again and continued to hack at the door with his knife. Lin Lin shouted, 'Mo Han!'
Mo Han quickly took out a gun and shot the soldier in the leg. He then grabbed Lin Lin and ran. Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, let's go!'
Che Zhen Shan, struggling to speak, said, "You beast, Mo Han, go save Lin Lin, hurry, take good care of her."
Che Zhen Shan, who was choking, couldn't speak, and could only shake his head from side to side.
Che Zhen Shan, who had just rushed out, was shot and injured. He struggled to get up, but was forced back by gunfire from the enemy.

The scene shifts to the next day, with the rising sun hanging high in the sky. Che Zhen Shan, having received the news, arrived at the courtyard of the Wang residence. The door was opened, and he walked in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: The scene shifts to the telegraph room, where the telegrapher is sending messages. A soldier comes in and hands him a piece of paper, and he quickly types on the machine. The soldier takes the paper back and leaves. The telegrapher then hands the paper to the next person in line.
Che Zhen Shan: 'Help me connect 4321.'
Secretary Yang picks up the phone and says: "Hello, brother, I want to send you some money." "You mentioned last time about moving." "Didn't move, right?"

Secretary Yang: 'Okay, our special agent will arrive at noon tomorrow. From the division to the regiment headquarters for an inspection. I might go back to Nanjing or maybe another place, so don't reply after receiving the money.' He hung up quickly after finishing.

The scene shifts to a room where a group of people are gathered around a table with a map. One person pointed at the map and said, 'Comrades, Special Agent Bai is coming from the division to the regiment headquarters. He'll pass through one of these routes. Tonight we'll plant mines here and ambush with machine guns at this high point.'
Guard: "Look to the right." "Look forward."
Guard: 'Report, Colonel. Just received a call from the division. Special Agent Bai has switched to a plane and is expected to arrive shortly.'
Che Zhen Shan: "Got it, you may go."
Guard replied: "Yes."
Che Zhen Shan: "Secretary Yang, Special Agent Bai is arriving soon." "You must be excited."
Secretary Yang laughs and says: "Indeed, a bit."
Che Zhen Shan says: "I'm not excited, I'm nervous, extremely nervous."
Secretary Yang says: 'Colonel, with you saying that, you've made me nervous as well. Whenever I get nervous, I feel like going to the restroom.'
Che Zhen Shan: "Alright, go quickly and come back soon." "Your superior will be here shortly."
Secretary Yang, who had been waiting outside for a long time, was a bit impatient. He looked around and then walked into the restroom, where he saw Che Zhen Shan washing his hands.
The scene shifts to the office of the Japanese army, where a soldier is anxiously pacing back and forth.
Secretary Yang, after hanging up, immediately dials the number for the battalion command post, saying: "Please connect me to 4321."
Che Zhen Shan, who was wiping his hands, stopped and said, "Special Agent Bai will be here soon." "Where is Secretary Yang?" "Lu Xiang, go check."
Che Zhen Shan, with tears in his eyes, slowly put down the receiver. He knew that with the current military situation, even if he were to beg for mercy, it would be futile.
Che Zhen Shan, who was originally walking slowly, immediately quickened his pace and walked briskly towards the restroom.
The scene shifts, and the guard shouted: "Secretary Yang, Secretary Yang."

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: The scene shifts to the first battalion's first company, where a car stops at the gate, and the soldiers immediately stand up to salute.

The car slowly stopped in front of the building, and the people on the car got off one by one. The car door opened, and Che Zhen Shan got out of the car with a smile. The car slowly drove away, and Che Zhen Shan waved to the people on the car.
Lu Xiao: "Commander, we've arrived."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Identity confirmation.'
Lu Xiao replied, 'Mmm.', and then got out of the car.
Che Zhen Shan salutes and says, 'Commander of the 101st Regiment Che Zhen Shan welcomes the special envoy's secretary for guidance.'
Che Zhen Shan replied, 'I'm here to learn.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you're too kind. I originally planned to personally receive you but I couldn't leave due to an urgent matter. I hope you can forgive me.'
Lu Xiao: 'Not at all, not at all.'
Lu Xiao: 'Please.'
Lu Xiao: "Good," Lu Xiao and Che Zhen Shan walked down the steps together, and the scene shifted to the entrance of the Liberation Army Daily.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you must be tired from your journey. I have organized a welcome banquet for you at Si Xi Grand Hotel, the best restaurant in Liucheng.'
Hong Zichen said, 'Commander, you're too kind.'
Lu Xiao: 'Please, come in.'

Lu Xiao said, 'Comrade Hong Zichen, the organization has decided to send you to infiltrate the Nationalist 101st Regiment. Your primary mission is to obtain the code. You will go disguised as the secretary of the Nanjing government's special envoy, Yang Mohan, and inspect their work.'
Lu Xiao said, 'We have already captured the real Yang Mohan, you must act cautiously, obtain the code by clever means, not by force.'
Hong Zichen said, "Yes."
The scene shifts to the Liberation Army Daily, where the staff is bustling.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you are so young, yet you have gained the appreciation of the special envoy. You have a bright future ahead.'
Che Zhen Shan asked, 'Why didn't you bring your family along for some fun?'
Lu Xiao replied, 'I'm not married yet.'
Che Linlin said, 'I have hands and feet; I don't need anyone to take care of me.'
The scene shifts to the second floor, where a soldier is carrying a bowl and saying, 'Miss Che, this is black chicken soup personally ordered by Lu Xiao to rejuvenate you.'

Che Zhen Shan introduced, 'This is my daughter Che Linlin,' 'She is in charge of the radio translation work,' 'She was frightened a few days ago,' 'Her mood hasn't been great,' 'I hope Secretary Yang can excuse her.'
Hong Zichen, after pondering for a moment, suggested, "Since Miss Che is upset, why not invite her to join us for a few drinks, to help ease her mood?"
Che Zhen Shan said, "That doesn't seem very appropriate."
Hong Zichen asked, 'Is there any inconvenience?'
Che Zhen Shan quickly responded: 'No, no, it would indeed be an honor for my daughter.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Che Linlin, Secretary Yang from Nanjing, is inviting you to dine at Si Xi Grand Hotel."
The woman said, 'Thank you, you two are such good people, thank you.'
Che Linlin: "It was snowing that day, it was exceptionally cold, and the old lady also said."
Hong Zichen said, 'Miss Che, you must be mistaken.'
Che Linlin said, 'No, I think it was you.' 'Think again.'
Hong Zichen said: 'But I have never been to Liucheng.'
Che Linlin said, 'How is that possible? That's strange.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Lu Xiang shouted: "Secretary Yang."
He walked to the door, hesitated for a moment, then raised his hand and knocked. After a while, no one came to open the door. He knocked again, but still, no one responded.
He looked around the bathroom, walked to the door, and knocked. No one responded. He pushed the door open and walked in.
The scene shifts to the office of the puppet army's battalion commander. He paces back and forth in agitation, occasionally glancing at his watch.
Che Linlin, seeing this, quickly hid behind the door and said: "Get out, you pervert, get out quickly, get out, you shameless lackey, you actually came into the women's restroom."
Lu Xiang asked: "What's the matter, Secretary Yang?"
Secretary Yang said: "Deputy Lu, I suddenly had a stomachache, I didn't see the sign clearly."
Che Linlin said: "Didn't see clearly, my foot! You did it on purpose."
The guard, holding his stomach, said: "Miss Che, I'm really sorry, I just can't hold it anymore."
Secretary Yang asked: "Che Linlin, are you okay?"
The guard said: "Oh no, I can't hold it any longer."
Lu Xiang walked into the bathroom and said, "Hurry up, the commissioner will be here soon."
He slowly raised his gun, aiming at the target, and then fired.
He slowly walked out of the bathroom, then quickly ran to the door, opened it, and walked out. The soldiers on the steps were still guarding, and Lu Xiang walked straight to the middle.
He opened the door and walked in, shouting: "Deputy Lu, Deputy Lu, where's Secretary Yang?"
The guard said, "Commissioner Bai has arrived."
Secretary Yang stuttered, "Commissioner Bai, he... he..."
Lu Xiang asked: "What's wrong with him?"
Lu Xiang said: "He had an accident."
Lu Xiang said: "What's wrong, spit it out quickly"
The scene shifts, and the soldier continues, "As soon as he got off the plane, a beggar with a bomb strapped to him rushed out of the bushes. When he got close, the commander shot him. But, but..."
Lu Xiang asked in disbelief: "The commander is dead?"
The soldier continued: "The commander dodged quickly and injured his leg, but Commissioner Bai, he... he"
Secretary Yang walked in and said: "What kind of guards are you?" Then he turned to Lu Xiang and said: "Oh my, Commissioner Bai, how did you die so suddenly?"

Shui Xiu watched as Wu Zheng left, then turned to look at the dried chili seeds on the wall. She seemed to have made some decision, her expression growing more resolute.
Shui Xiu, with a determined gaze, walked straight into the house. She looked at the neatly arranged wooden racks, filled with jicama.

Shui Xiu looked at the departing figure of Wu Zheng, tears welling up in her eyes. She knew that Wu Zheng didn't want to leave, but she also knew that Wu Zheng didn't want to stay. She was torn between the two, and her heart was in turmoil. She didn't know what to do, and she didn't want to make a decision. She just wanted to be with Wu Zheng, to be with the person she loved.

The scene shifts, and Shui Xiu is seen carrying a basin of clothes, walking out of the house, and then placing the basin on the table in the yard. She then took out a few eggs from her pocket, placed them on the table, and then took out a few more, placing them in her hand. She walked towards the man who was smoking.
Shui Xiu said, "Wu Zheng big brother, it's time to eat."
Shui Xiu looked around the courtyard, then turned and walked towards the house. She hesitated for a moment at the door, her hand pausing in mid-air, then she pushed the door open and entered.
Shui Xiu knocked on the door and called out, "Big Brother Wu Zheng."

Shui Xiu returned to the room, closed the door, and then slowly walked to the table. She picked up the letter that Wu Zheng had left her, read it carefully, and finally put down the letter with a heavy heart. She knew that Wu Zheng had made a difficult decision. She looked at the letter on the table, her mind filled with mixed emotions.

The letter read: "Shui Xiu, Feng Yucheng, please forgive my unannounced departure." "The village tourism project needs funds." "I’m going back to discuss with my friends." "Thank you very much for taking care of me during this time." "Wait for my news." "Wu Zheng"

Shui Xiu, holding the admission letter, looked at it for a long time without coming to her senses. She knew her daughter was very sick, but she never thought she would be taken away. She stared at the admission letter, her eyes gradually turning cold. She knew she couldn't keep her daughter with her.

Wu Zheng thought to himself: "For Shui Xiu, such a pure and kind woman, to bear pressures she shouldn't have to is unfortunate. I should protect her and help her. I should help the honest and simple Feng Yucheng brother. The virtuous and hospitable Shui Xiu, and those simple and kind villagers of Yingtan."
Uncle Lao Qing, with a cane, walked into the yard and called out, "Shui Xiu."
Uncle Lao Qing said, "Shui Xiu, you are amazing. You reported the matter to Liu Yuhai and it has been accepted by the authorities. You'll see."
Shui Xiu said, "Really?" Shui Xiu took the letter and looked at it carefully.

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Uncle Qing said: "It's written here."
Shui Xiu took the letter and said, "Uncle Qing, thank you." After reading the contents of the letter, Shui Xiu was deeply moved. She looked at Uncle Qing with a face full of gratitude and respect.
Uncle Qing: "No need to thank." "It seems that I, the old village chief, am not useful anymore." "From now on, I can only run errands and deliver letters for you guys."
Shui Xiu: "Uncle Qing, if I, Shui Xiu, have said something unpleasant." "Please don't take it to heart, I apologize to you."
Uncle Qing said: "What are you talking about? I should apologize to you. You go ahead, I am leaving."
Shui Xiu said: "Then let me accompany you."
Er Niuzi asked: "Big brother, what happened?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Well, an announcement has been issued from above, stating that I violated the environmental protection law and asked me to close the quarry."
Er Niuzi said: "How is this possible? I think this is all caused by Shui Xiu. This is the result of her complaining to the authorities."
Liu Yuhai said: "Why is this woman so ruthless, just because her husband is injured. Ah, now he is not just cutting off my income, but also the income of everyone in the village."
Er Niuzi said: "Yes."
Liu Yuhai said: "Do you think she is sick, is she crazy?"
Er Niuzi said: "Yes, we can't be soft on such a madwoman. Brother, shall we bring a few people tonight to smash her house?"
Liu Yuhai said: "No need, if she wants to fight with me, I will fight with her in a fair and open manner."
Er Niuzi asked: "So how do you fight?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Our village is not about to hold elections, right? If Uncle Qing steps down, then the position of village head will be mine."

Liu Yuhai said: "In this way, you go from door to door in the village for me. Just tell them, say that I am certain to win the election for village chief this time. And you have to tell them, tell them that I have already booked 20,000 square meters of slate. As long as everyone participates, everyone will make money. Go on."
Er Niuzi said: "Ou La." Liu Yuhai, who was sitting in the office, heard the sound, turned his head, and saw Er Niuzi leaving with the drawing in his hand.
Shui Xiu: "Yucheng."
Feng Yuquan said: "Oh, Sister Mei Feng."
Mei Feng asked: "Where is your Shui Xiu?"
Feng Yuquan said: "She's out, is there something wrong?"
Mei Feng said: "She's out? My husband has been crushed to death, you've been turned into a disabled person. She goes out every day, what is she doing out there?"
Feng Yuquan said: "Sister Mei Feng, don't talk nonsense."

Mei Feng said: "Oh, don't I talk nonsense? Who in the village doesn't know, your Shui Xiu. With that little white face taking photos, she goes out every day, do you know what she is doing? Do you? You are such an idiot."
Feng Yuquan said: "Mei Feng."

Shui Xiu said: "This, is what Yao Yao and I wrote after visiting other tourist attractions these past few days." "With this planning book, we can develop, develop tourism."

I just signed a very big order with Boss Wang from Shanghai. They ordered a full 20,000 square meters of stone plates. Folks, 20,000 square meters of stone plates, just for this year, that order will keep us all busy."
Liu Yuhai, holding a microphone, walked to the center of the stage and said: "I, Liu Yuhai, have one principle." "Money isn't everything."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Liu Yuhai said: "Having no money is absolutely not an option. I only recognize one word, and that is money."

When that time comes, I will help everyone make more money and let our villagers live the life of the wealthy sooner rather than later."
Liu Yuhai said: "My speech is over!"
Liu Yuhai: "Please welcome Li Shuixiu to speak."

Li Shuixiu continued: "Fellow villagers, I, Shuixiu, am not good at speaking. But today, I want to introduce a concept to everyone. That is soil and water conservation and environmental protection. Maybe you all, don't understand the concept I'm talking about, so let me put it another way. We live at the foot of the big mountains, relying on the mountains for our livelihood. Mei Feng said: "What you're saying, we also can't understand, right? If we can't understand, then explain it clearly."

Li Shuixiu: "Then let's talk about tourism. As long as everyone trusts me, Shuixiu, I will lead everyone to vigorously develop our Yingtang's tourism, promote our village far and wide. As long as we can make tourism work, every family in our village could become wealthy."

Er Niuzi said: "Liu Yuhai brother, I..."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Er Niuzi said: 'I can no longer call you brother, I'll just call you Village Chief Liu.'

Shui Xiu said, "Village head, we've calculated it. Right now, to develop tourism, we don't need that much money. As long as we can get the word out, the tourism will take off."

Liu Yuhai said: "I understand what you're saying. My principle is still the same: money. If you can make money, I'll support whatever you do. But, look at our village committee, we can't even squeeze out a penny."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Shui Xiu and Yao Yao were looking at the notice on the wall. Shui Xiu asked: "Wu Zheng brother, what is this?"

The villagers all said: "Okay."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: A Villager asked: "Does tourism really make money? How much can it give us a year?"

Zhang Dong's Younger Brother suddenly walked in and shouted: "Wait a minute, wait a minute, the election is invalid, the election is invalid!" Zhang Dong's Younger Brother walked in and snatched the megaphone, shouting: "Come on, come on, someone is buying votes, someone is buying votes, come on."
The scene shifts to a photo, where a man is seen lying on the bed, holding a woman's hand.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Zhang Xi asked: "How should we deal with this?"

Another villager said: 'Whenever the poor and lonely elderly in our village fall sick, he is always the first to front up their medical expenses.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

Zhang Dong said: "Okay." "To be honest, I didn't want to be it initially." "Being a village official is not a great job." "Being a village chief is annoying enough for me." "However, since everyone trusts me so much and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being, I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Zhang Xiaobao: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."

Zhang Xiaobao angrily said: "Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang said: "You know about the great pig farm in the village." "Why is it leased to our family every year?" Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."

Through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms, and through multi-layer filtration, degrade pollutants, purify water quality and discharge rationally. This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu said: "What is going on here"

Mother said: 'But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The car drove into the mountain road, the sunlight shone through the trees, the mountain scenery was beautiful, the car was moving slowly, the camera slowly zoomed in, a man with sunglasses appeared in the picture.

The next day, the sun was shining, and the weather was clear. The villagers were busy on the streets. A group of people in the village was walking two by two, and the man in the leather jacket at the front was Zhang Dong.
The scene shifts to the balcony where a few people are walking in. One of them says: "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting brought the medicine to Auntie He's bedside and said: 'Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget.'

Bao Liang said: 'Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?'
Director asked: 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
